thread.title: Slain California teacher begged for life in butt dial call
thread.title_full: Slain California teacher begged for life in butt dial call

author: JASON SILVERSTEIN
title: Slain California teacher begged for life in butt dial call
text:
Slain California teacher apparently begged for life in 'butt dial' voicemail Slain California teacher begged for life in butt dial call NEW YORK DAILY NEWS Updated:  51 PM 
A teacher in California who was murdered three years ago is heard begging for her life in an accidental call made by her alleged killer, new court documents say. 
Riverside County court documents filed last week include a transcription of the final voicemail left by Jill Thomas Grant, a math teacher found dead two days before Christmas in 2013. 
Her boyfriend, Michael John Franco, is accused of slitting her throat with a box cutter, running her over with a car and dumping her corpse on a golf course. 
Grant’s last moments are captured in the “butt dial” message, in which she is heard apparently trying to help Franco come up with a cover story if he will abandon his murder plot. 
“What if I drive the car someplace and call myself and say I was attacked? Would that work?” Grant says, according to a transcript obtained by the Deseret News. 
She says the two can “think of something to say.” 
“I am sure we can think of something,” she says. Michael John Franco (Indio Police Department) 
“What do you want me to say? What should I say?” 
The transcript notes that parts of the call are inaudible, according to the Sun. The voicemail came from Franco's phone and ended up in the mailbox of a friend. 
Franco has pleaded not guilty to the slaying. But court filings say he allegedly confessed to a cellmate that he cut his girlfriend’s throat during a fight, took her to a golf course and killed her when she tried to escape. 
Prosecutors said they also have security footage of Franco using Grant’s ATM card to take money the night she was killed. He was busted with bank cards, a cellphone and a Glock pistol all belonging to her. 
After police Tasered and arrested him, Franco allegedly said he was trying to flee to Mexico but would now be “going to prison for the rest of his life,” prosecutors said. Tags:
